Summary: [Setup] As a Developer, I need a complete, one-command local development environment.
Description:
Description: This story covers the initial project scaffolding and Docker orchestration to ensure all services can run locally and communicate with each other using a single `docker-compose up` command.

Acceptance Criteria (AC):
- AC-1: The project is a Git repository with the CCS-specified root structure (`/frontend`, `/backend`, `docker-compose.yml`, etc.).
- AC-2: `docker-compose up --build` successfully builds and runs all services (frontend, backend, postgres, redis, minio, whisper) without errors.
- AC-3: All services are accessible on their specified ports (e.g., Frontend: 3000, Backend: 8000, MinIO: 9000).
- AC-4: The root `.env` and `.env.local` files are present and gitignored, and a complete `.env.template` exists as per the CCS.

Summary: Initialize Project Structure & Git Repository
Description: Description: Create the initial Git repository and core project layout.

Summary: Initialize a Git repository with a main branch
Create the root .gitignore file, ensuring it includes `.env`, `.env.local`, `node_modules/`, `__pycache__/`, `.DS_Store`, etc.
Create the root `README.md` with the project title and a brief overview.
Create the `/frontend` and `/backend` directories as specified in CCS `<DIRECTORY_STRUCTURE>`.
Create a root `Makefile` with initial targets for `up`, `down`, `build`, and `logs` to simplify Docker commands.
Create Root `docker-compose.yml`
Description:
Description: Define the orchestration for all services required for local development.

Developer Notes: All service definitions must use environment variables for configuration and mount volumes for persistent data where necessary.

Summary: Define the `postgres` service using the `postgres:16` image, mapping a volume to `/var/lib/postgresql/data` for persistence and forwarding port 5432.
Define the `redis` service using the `redis:7` image.
Define the `minio` service, including environment variables for root user/password, a volume for data persistence, and port mappings for 9000 (API) and 9001 (Console).
Define a placeholder `whisper-service` container that will eventually host the transcription model.
Define the `backend` service, configured to build from `./backend/Dockerfile`, map port 8000, and set `depends_on` for `postgres` and `redis`.
Define the `frontend` service, configured to build from `./frontend/Dockerfile`, map port 3000, and set `depends_on` for `backend`.
Create Environment Variable Templates
Description:
Description: Create the template file that documents all necessary environment variables for the project.

Developer Notes: This file is critical for onboarding and must be a 1:1 match with the CCS `<ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLES>` section.

Summary: Create a root `.env.template` file.
Copy and paste the complete list of variables from the CCS into `.env.template`.
Create a local `.env` file from the template for immediate use, filling in default local values.
Configure MinIO Bucket
Description:
Description: Create a small script or add a command to the `Makefile` to automatically create the required S3 bucket in MinIO on first run.

Developer Notes: MinIO does not create buckets automatically. This prevents a common "NoSuchBucket" error during initial setup. Reference `S3_BUCKET_NAME` from the `.env` file.
